title: Morde's Dragon Knight skin isn't included in the Dragon Themed skinline
body: Noticed this on the Easter event page and is the same with in client as well, which usually sorts skins by skinline.

replies.body: Interesting. I'll take a look at it and see if we can't find him a home in Dragon World.
Just keep in mind that he's a DragonKNIGHT and not a slayer, he made the Dragon's power his own, just like Swain.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tTpcAUOc,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-04-04T22:01:53.179+0000)
>
> Just keep in mind that he's a DragonKNIGHT and not a slayer, he made the Dragon's power his own, just like Swain.

No no no, he doesnt have powers of a dragon he IS a dragon, that is why the skin is called Dragon Knight... Because under all that armor and helmet, there is an actual dragon, a dragon who is a knight as well.
Didn't Swain get corrupted by the dragon?
Yep. He was originally a dragon slayer, but he ended up being corrupted by their power.
Riot forgot he exists. Or maybe its a bug.
It pre dates. Skin lines.  As it were. Also it's a legacy skin.
